identity.name: SalesCommand Enterprise
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with SaaS utility
Content is King: Data density without clutter
Negative Space: Use whitespace to group, not lines
Contrast: High contrast for readability, subtle contrast for hierarchy

usage_rules: Labels/Overlines: Inter, weight 600, uppercase, tracking-widest (0.1em), text-xs

rules: Use 'Tinted Grey' rule: Neutrals should have a hint of blue (slate)
Text contrast must meet APCA standards

container_styles.card: bg-white border border-border rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid backgrounds for depth
visual_enhancers.shadows: Layered shadows (ambient + direct) for floating elements

general: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Follow the 'Control Room' grid layout for the dashboard.
dashboard: Implement a 'Linear Story' layout: Top KPIs -> Pipeline -> Forecast -> Team -> Activity.
Use 'Grid Borders' style: Visible grid lines between widgets, minimal gaps.
KPI Cards should be simple, high-contrast, with sparklines if possible.
sidebar: Dark mode sidebar (Slate-900) to contrast with the light content area.
Active state: White text with a subtle left border indicator or background tint.
tables: No vertical borders inside the table.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, gradients).
Create depth through z-index and subtle shadows.
Do not center align the app container.
Use modern button styles (pill or sharp).
